info.name: Smoother Subsplease Dark Mode
info.description:
Enhancements to dark mode and various "fixes".

My theme doesn't mess with the light theme's colors, so you have to enable dark mode at the bottom of the page to make full use of it.
info.additionalInfo: It's a theme I put together for myself, but I think it's complete enough to share. I might style the packlist and/or enable an accent color modifier in the future.
